title.guidance: Expect scenes of threat and violence.
title.synopsis: Midsomer's annual scarecrow festival takes a grisly turn when dead bodies begin appearing on poles, but what is behind the murders?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Visit Britain's most murderous county... stream every episode

brand.title: Midsomer Murders

synopses.ninety: Visit Britain's most murderous county... stream every episode

episodes.guidance: Contains some scenes of violence and sexual material.
episodes.synopsis: In the tranquil village of Midsomer Worthy, the local writers' circle is eagerly anticipating a visit from a best-selling novelist. But the aspiring authors are about to witness a sequence of gruesome events far stranger than any fiction.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In the tranquil village of Midsomer Worthy, the local writers' circle is eagerly anticipating a visit from a best-selling novelist. But the aspiring authors are about to witness a sequence of gruesome events far stranger than any fiction.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violent moments and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: In the quiet rural village of Ferne Bassett, an elderly resident is found drowned after a violent attack. Meanwhile, a local amateur dramatic production of Amadeus reveals a hitherto unseen world of intrigue and passion.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In the quiet rural village of Ferne Bassett, an elderly resident is found drowned after a violent attack. Meanwhile, a local amateur dramatic production of Amadeus reveals a hitherto unseen world of intrigue and passion.

episodes.guidance: Contains language that may offend some viewers.
episodes.synopsis: The village of Morton Fendle seems to be overflowing with community spirit when many of the residents invest in the local craft centre. But DCI Barnaby is called in after the wife of the centre's owner goes missing and a neighbour is murdered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The village of Morton Fendle seems to be overflowing with community spirit when many of the residents invest in the local craft centre. But DCI Barnaby is called in after the wife of the centre's owner goes missing and a neighbour is murdered.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence and crime scene images.
episodes.synopsis: When the founder of a nearby commune is murdered, DCI Barnaby is faced with an eccentric cast of suspects including an heiress, a psychic, and a boy who has lost his tongue.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the founder of a nearby commune is murdered, DCI Barnaby is faced with an eccentric cast of suspects including an heiress, a psychic, and a boy who has lost his tongue.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: The inhabitants of a sleepy village are shocked when a local property developer, recently diagnosed with a malignant brain tumour, is brutally murdered. DCI Barnaby arrives in Badger's Drift to investigate the seemingly tragic crime.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The inhabitants of a sleepy village are shocked when a local property developer, recently diagnosed with a malignant brain tumour, is brutally murdered. DCI Barnaby arrives in Badger's Drift to investigate the seemingly tragic crime.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence and moderate language
episodes.synopsis: When a woman is killed in local woodland, nine years after three identical murders, Barnaby and Troy are led into the murky, clandestine world of Midsomer Worthy.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a woman is killed in local woodland, nine years after three identical murders, Barnaby and Troy are led into the murky, clandestine world of Midsomer Worthy.

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence and some moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: When the wife of a wealthy landowner is bludgeoned to death with a cricket bat, DCI Barnaby becomes enmeshed in a succession of calculating murders.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the wife of a wealthy landowner is bludgeoned to death with a cricket bat, DCI Barnaby becomes enmeshed in a succession of calculating murders.

episodes.guidance: Includes traditional dancing that might offend some viewers.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy are called in to investigate when the local magistrate, principal adversary of two groups of travellers, is found dead at his home in Martyr Warren.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Troy are called in to investigate when the local magistrate, principal adversary of two groups of travellers, is found dead at his home in Martyr Warren.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence and some moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby realises that there is more to a case than first appears, when the father of a man jailed for murder is also killed.

description.descriptionTextNormal: DCI Barnaby realises that there is more to a case than first appears, when the father of a man jailed for murder is also killed.

episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby and DS Troy are called in to investigate the murder of an ex-schoolmistress in a nursing home.

description.descriptionTextNormal: DCI Barnaby and DS Troy are called in to investigate the murder of an ex-schoolmistress in a nursing home.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: When a thief is stabbed to death with a pitchfork and two villagers are murdered, DCI Tom Barnaby has to find the killer before he strikes again.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a thief is stabbed to death with a pitchfork and two villagers are murdered, DCI Tom Barnaby has to find the killer before he strikes again.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy try to find out whether mysterious events in Aspern Tallow and the discovery of a body are supernatural, or if there is a rational explanation.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Troy try to find out whether mysterious events in Aspern Tallow and the discovery of a body are supernatural, or if there is a rational explanation.

episodes.synopsis: The death of a hotel owner leads to murder and intrigue, and Detective Barnaby uncovers a web of illicit affairs and shady business dealings.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The death of a hotel owner leads to murder and intrigue, and Detective Barnaby uncovers a web of illicit affairs and shady business dealings.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence and autopsy nudity.
episodes.synopsis: A man is found in the middle of a crop circle, naked, with two puncture wounds. A ufologist claims extra-terrestrial involvement but DCI Tom Barnaby seeks a more plausible reason.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A man is found in the middle of a crop circle, naked, with two puncture wounds. A ufologist claims extra-terrestrial involvement but DCI Tom Barnaby seeks a more plausible reason.

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of a villager brings DCI Tom Barnaby face to face with old adversary Melvyn Stockard, now reinvented as the local squire. When a body is pulled out of a well, Barnaby is convinced that Stockard is somehow involved.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The disappearance of a villager brings DCI Tom Barnaby face to face with old adversary Melvyn Stockard, now reinvented as the local squire. When a body is pulled out of a well, Barnaby is convinced that Stockard is somehow involved.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence and some sexual content.
episodes.synopsis: When a village postman is brutally murdered, DCI Barnaby uncovers a hotbed of adultery within the remote hamlet of Goodman's Land.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a village postman is brutally murdered, DCI Barnaby uncovers a hotbed of adultery within the remote hamlet of Goodman's Land.

episodes.synopsis: When the body of arrogant local beauty Melissa Townsend is discovered by the pool at her manor house, DCI Barnaby uncovers a seedy world of adultery and deceit within the affluent rural community.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the body of arrogant local beauty Melissa Townsend is discovered by the pool at her manor house, DCI Barnaby uncovers a seedy world of adultery and deceit within the affluent rural community.

episodes.guidance: Contains violence and some strong language.
episodes.synopsis: When a family turn the memorial garden into a tea shop, they dig up more than just the animosity of the locals, leaving DCI Tom Barnaby to investigate a murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a family turn the memorial garden into a tea shop, they dig up more than just the animosity of the locals, leaving DCI Tom Barnaby to investigate a murder.

episodes.synopsis: When the leader of a reading club used as a cover to run an investment portfolio is found battered to death, the club's activities are exposed and long-held secrets and desires return to haunt its members.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the leader of a reading club used as a cover to run an investment portfolio is found battered to death, the club's activities are exposed and long-held secrets and desires return to haunt its members.

episodes.synopsis: When a woman's body is discovered, Barnaby soon finds himself in the middle of a world of witchcraft, ancient potions, infidelity and land feuds.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a woman's body is discovered, Barnaby soon finds himself in the middle of a world of witchcraft, ancient potions, infidelity and land feuds.

episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby investigates the murders of the village church bell-ringers, and must solve a riddle from the past before the killer strikes again.

description.descriptionTextNormal: DCI Barnaby investigates the murders of the village church bell-ringers, and must solve a riddle from the past before the killer strikes again.

episodes.synopsis: Devington College dominates the economy and social life of Midsomer Parva - but then the activities of its elite Pudding Club lead to murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Devington College dominates the economy and social life of Midsomer Parva - but then the activities of its elite Pudding Club lead to murder.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy have to solve a double murder when a feisty former socialite and a Casanova are found bludgeoned to death.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Troy have to solve a double murder when a feisty former socialite and a Casanova are found bludgeoned to death.

episodes.guidance: Contains some adult scenes.
episodes.synopsis: The apparent suicide of a local ne'er-do-well arouses suspicions due to the complexity of his death.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The apparent suicide of a local ne'er-do-well arouses suspicions due to the complexity of his death.

episodes.synopsis: Some amateur painters become witnesses to a murder when one of their number is killed. As his wife is part of the group, DCI Barnaby is taken off the case.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Some amateur painters become witnesses to a murder when one of their number is killed. As his wife is part of the group, DCI Barnaby is taken off the case.

episodes.synopsis: The death of a young film star at the opening of 'Satanic Experience', held at his family's ancestral home, brings Barnaby and Troy to two feuding villages.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The death of a young film star at the opening of 'Satanic Experience', held at his family's ancestral home, brings Barnaby and Troy to two feuding villages.

episodes.guidance: This programme contains scenes that some viewers may find distressing.
episodes.synopsis: When Julian Shepherd is found drowned it seems as though he died of suicide, but Barnaby suspects foul play.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Julian Shepherd is found drowned it seems as though he died of suicide, but Barnaby suspects foul play.

episodes.guidance: Contains some adult material and the use of moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: An accident during the restoration of a canal leads to a particularly difficult case for Barnaby and Troy.

description.descriptionTextNormal: An accident during the restoration of a canal leads to a particularly difficult case for Barnaby and Troy.

episodes.guidance: Contains some mild crime scene images.
episodes.synopsis: Sergeant Dan Scott arrives to work with Barnaby and is thrown straight into a murder investigation in Midsomer Mallow.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Sergeant Dan Scott arrives to work with Barnaby and is thrown straight into a murder investigation in Midsomer Mallow.

episodes.guidance: Contains several references to witchcraft.
episodes.synopsis: Long-suppressed family secrets, stolen ancient artefacts, and a thirty-year-old death at a Celtic burial site result in a series of murders in Midsomer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Long-suppressed family secrets, stolen ancient artefacts, and a thirty-year-old death at a Celtic burial site result in a series of murders in Midsomer.

episodes.synopsis: When Midsomer hosts its Annual Literary Festival, an author is found with a broken neck. More writers will die before the winner is announced.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Midsomer hosts its Annual Literary Festival, an author is found with a broken neck. More writers will die before the winner is announced.

episodes.guidance: Contains some crime scene violence and occasional use of moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: The regulars of Midsomer Worthy's local pub are thrown into a murder case involving unrequited love and secret business deals, after the young barman is found dead.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The regulars of Midsomer Worthy's local pub are thrown into a murder case involving unrequited love and secret business deals, after the young barman is found dead.

episodes.guidance: Contains frequent references to witchcraft and some moderately disturbing crime scenes.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates when a priest is burned to death inside the effigy of a straw woman and more people burst into flames spontaneously as though by witchcraft.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates when a priest is burned to death inside the effigy of a straw woman and more people burst into flames spontaneously as though by witchcraft.

episodes.synopsis: It is Christmas, but when the troubled Villiers family get together nine years after the death of eldest son and magician Ferdy, two deaths are predicted...

description.descriptionTextNormal: It is Christmas, but when the troubled Villiers family get together nine years after the death of eldest son and magician Ferdy, two deaths are predicted...

episodes.episodeTitle: Things That Go Bump in the Night
episodes.guidance: Contains mild references to the occult throughout.
episodes.synopsis: Undertaker Patrick Pennyman is found dead with his wrists slashed, and suspicion turns towards a spiritualist church.

description.descriptionTextStrong: 1. Things That Go Bump in the Night
description.descriptionTextNormal: Undertaker Patrick Pennyman is found dead with his wrists slashed, and suspicion turns towards a spiritualist church.

episodes.numberedEpisodeTitle: 1. Things That Go Bump in the Night

episodes.guidance: Contains moderate language and some violence.
episodes.synopsis: The body of Rowing Club chairman Guy Sweetman is found bludgeoned and drowned during a regatta. As Sweetman was prolifically promiscuous, jealousy would seem to be the motive.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The body of Rowing Club chairman Guy Sweetman is found bludgeoned and drowned during a regatta. As Sweetman was prolifically promiscuous, jealousy would seem to be the motive.

episodes.synopsis: When one of the world's rarest orchids is smuggled illegally into Midsomer Malham, it triggers a catalogue of passion, jealousy and death.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When one of the world's rarest orchids is smuggled illegally into Midsomer Malham, it triggers a catalogue of passion, jealousy and death.

episodes.guidance: Contains some moderate violence.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates the case of a four-member racehorse syndicate. Two of them are desperate to sell the horse and two are determined to keep it, then one member is murdered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates the case of a four-member racehorse syndicate. Two of them are desperate to sell the horse and two are determined to keep it, then one member is murdered.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Scott assess the post-mortem of a man involved in a pub fight. They suspect that the burn marks on his skull may indicate a different cause of death.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Scott assess the post-mortem of a man involved in a pub fight. They suspect that the burn marks on his skull may indicate a different cause of death.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Scott investigate when a solicitor falls from a roof to his death. A revenge motive emerges when the dead man's rival also dies - but who is behind it?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Scott investigate when a solicitor falls from a roof to his death. A revenge motive emerges when the dead man's rival also dies - but who is behind it?

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates when a naked body is found in the warehouse of a small but respected relish factory owned by a dysfunctional family.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates when a naked body is found in the warehouse of a small but respected relish factory owned by a dysfunctional family.

episodes.synopsis: In Midsomer a local man is murdered and a valuable manuscript is found amongst his effects and Barnaby suspects it is a forgery, by someone hoping to gain a share in the continuing royalties.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In Midsomer a local man is murdered and a valuable manuscript is found amongst his effects and Barnaby suspects it is a forgery, by someone hoping to gain a share in the continuing royalties.

episodes.guidance: May contain scenes of violence, crime scenes and moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Acting DC Ben Jones investigate the garrotting of a husband and wife outside a deserted cottage.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Acting DC Ben Jones investigate the garrotting of a husband and wife outside a deserted cottage.

episodes.guidance: Contains some mild scenes of violence.
episodes.synopsis: Midsomer Barton is celebrating Oak Apple Week when a mother is found drowned. It looks like suicide and that she was driven to it by grief.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Midsomer Barton is celebrating Oak Apple Week when a mother is found drowned. It looks like suicide and that she was driven to it by grief.

episodes.guidance: Contains mild language & some violence.
episodes.synopsis: Sir Freddy Butler's death brings Barnaby and Jones to the privileged surroundings of Haddington Hall. The cause of death looks like a heart attack until Freddy's will disappears.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Sir Freddy Butler's death brings Barnaby and Jones to the privileged surroundings of Haddington Hall. The cause of death looks like a heart attack until Freddy's will disappears.

episodes.synopsis: When a council clerk is shot dead, Barnaby and Jones discover that he was a blackmailer. They investigate which of his victims hated him enough to kill him.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a council clerk is shot dead, Barnaby and Jones discover that he was a blackmailer. They investigate which of his victims hated him enough to kill him.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: After Midsomer Worthy's baritone Connor Simpson is killed just days before a choir competition, the race is on for Barnaby and Jones to catch the killer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After Midsomer Worthy's baritone Connor Simpson is killed just days before a choir competition, the race is on for Barnaby and Jones to catch the killer.

episodes.guidance: Contains some moderate violence and scenes of a sexual nature.
episodes.synopsis: Controversial plans to build a supermarket in Elverton-cum-Latterly lead to murder when a man is stabbed. Can Barnaby and Jones uncover the killer?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Controversial plans to build a supermarket in Elverton-cum-Latterly lead to murder when a man is stabbed. Can Barnaby and Jones uncover the killer?

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby begins to question the guilt of a woman who is on trial for the murder of her best friend when the prosecution's claims do not appear to add up.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby begins to question the guilt of a woman who is on trial for the murder of her best friend when the prosecution's claims do not appear to add up.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby uncovers a decades-old battle of the sexes when ageing feminist Mildred Danvers and misogynist vicar Rev Gantis are murdered. Extended episode.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby uncovers a decades-old battle of the sexes when ageing feminist Mildred Danvers and misogynist vicar Rev Gantis are murdered. Extended episode.

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a young man is found in a Second World War-era motor car filled with exhaust fumes, it looks like suicide. But all is not as it seems.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the body of a young man is found in a Second World War-era motor car filled with exhaust fumes, it looks like suicide. But all is not as it seems.

episodes.guidance: Contains some crime scene images.
episodes.synopsis: A woman in search of her uncle finds that he has spread rumours about her and disappeared, but worse is to follow when his corpse is discovered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A woman in search of her uncle finds that he has spread rumours about her and disappeared, but worse is to follow when his corpse is discovered.

episodes.synopsis: A glassware factory faces ruin, an accountant is murdered with a Masonic dagger, and a production of Hamlet seems to contain a message for DCI Barnaby.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A glassware factory faces ruin, an accountant is murdered with a Masonic dagger, and a production of Hamlet seems to contain a message for DCI Barnaby.

episodes.synopsis: Badger's Drift plays host to the Midsomer Rock Festival, and the long-awaited return of the Hired Gun rock band, but there are murderous consequences.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Badger's Drift plays host to the Midsomer Rock Festival, and the long-awaited return of the Hired Gun rock band, but there are murderous consequences.

episodes.synopsis: When Dr Alan Delaney is killed by a hit-and-run driver, Barnaby realises that the real target was the doctor’s senior partner, Dr James Kirkwood.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Dr Alan Delaney is killed by a hit-and-run driver, Barnaby realises that the real target was the doctor’s senior partner, Dr James Kirkwood.

episodes.synopsis: When a local photographer is murdered, DCI Barnaby becomes the prime suspect in the case. As the evidence mounts against him, will he be able to clear his name?

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a local photographer is murdered, DCI Barnaby becomes the prime suspect in the case. As the evidence mounts against him, will he be able to clear his name?

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes some viewers may find distressing.
episodes.synopsis: A film about the French Revolution is made in Midsomer Magna. People are beheaded by a guillotine on set, and it's not a film trick.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A film about the French Revolution is made in Midsomer Magna. People are beheaded by a guillotine on set, and it's not a film trick.

episodes.guidance: With some violence.
episodes.synopsis: When Barnaby's former colleague is killed, he investigates a link between a halfway house for ex-prisoners and a seedy group called the Friday Nighters.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Barnaby's former colleague is killed, he investigates a link between a halfway house for ex-prisoners and a seedy group called the Friday Nighters.

episodes.guidance: Contains strong language.
episodes.synopsis: After a war memorial is unveiled in Midsomer Parva, a 90-year feud between the Hicks and the Hammonds families results in a murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: After a war memorial is unveiled in Midsomer Parva, a 90-year feud between the Hicks and the Hammonds families results in a murder.

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence.
episodes.synopsis: As his daughter Cully prepares for her upcoming wedding, Barnaby is called to another celebration, that of aristocrat Ned Fitzroy, at which the maid of honour is murdered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: As his daughter Cully prepares for her upcoming wedding, Barnaby is called to another celebration, that of aristocrat Ned Fitzroy, at which the maid of honour is murdered.

episodes.synopsis: Jones back to his hometown to investigate the murders of a reclusive couple and someone at the wedding of an old friend, causing childhood memories to come flooding back.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Jones back to his hometown to investigate the murders of a reclusive couple and someone at the wedding of an old friend, causing childhood memories to come flooding back.

episodes.guidance: Contains adult themes.
episodes.synopsis: When a body is found in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, country magazine Midsomer Life and its outspoken owner Guy Sandys come under scrutiny from Barnaby and Jones.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a body is found in woodland near Midsomer Sonning, country magazine Midsomer Life and its outspoken owner Guy Sandys come under scrutiny from Barnaby and Jones.

episodes.synopsis: A magician's assistant drops dead during a show, having been poisoned by a deadly frog. Barnaby and Jones investigate the secretive world of Midsomer's Magic Circle.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A magician's assistant drops dead during a show, having been poisoned by a deadly frog. Barnaby and Jones investigate the secretive world of Midsomer's Magic Circle.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates an explosion at a haulage yard. When a body turns up, there are plenty of suspects, including a grieving mother and a group of Territorial Army soldiers.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates an explosion at a haulage yard. When a body turns up, there are plenty of suspects, including a grieving mother and a group of Territorial Army soldiers.

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates a supposedly haunted forest, the disappearances of two couples, and a gang of antiquity thieves.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates a supposedly haunted forest, the disappearances of two couples, and a gang of antiquity thieves.

episodes.guidance: Some mild language and violence.
episodes.synopsis: A golf club is rocked by controversy when a golfer is bludgeoned to death. Barnaby and Jones uncover a tale of gambling, illegal money lending and assault.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A golf club is rocked by controversy when a golfer is bludgeoned to death. Barnaby and Jones uncover a tale of gambling, illegal money lending and assault.

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence and scenes that some viewers may find upsetting..
episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby's secret past as a spy is revealed when a former agent is found dead following a cricket match in Midsomer Parva.

description.descriptionTextNormal: DCI Barnaby's secret past as a spy is revealed when a former agent is found dead following a cricket match in Midsomer Parva.

episodes.guidance: With some nudity.
episodes.synopsis: A recently discovered piece by a local artist fetches an impressive price at auction just hours before its previous owner is murdered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A recently discovered piece by a local artist fetches an impressive price at auction just hours before its previous owner is murdered.

episodes.synopsis: When a local scientist threatens to reveal details of a potentially lethal software glitch in a new air traffic control system, Barnaby considers the intended target of a murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a local scientist threatens to reveal details of a potentially lethal software glitch in a new air traffic control system, Barnaby considers the intended target of a murder.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby delves into the truth behind the residents of Little Worthy, after the body of a local troublemaker and lothario is found dead in the hamlet's model village.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby delves into the truth behind the residents of Little Worthy, after the body of a local troublemaker and lothario is found dead in the hamlet's model village.

episodes.synopsis: A burglar known as 'The Creeper' terrorises Midsomer as Barnaby and Jones investigate the murder of a dinner party guest at upper-crust Chettham Park House.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A burglar known as 'The Creeper' terrorises Midsomer as Barnaby and Jones investigate the murder of a dinner party guest at upper-crust Chettham Park House.

episodes.synopsis: When a councillor is found dead in a schoolteacher's garden, Barnaby and Jones uncover jealous rivals, ruthless social climbers and a cottage with secrets.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a councillor is found dead in a schoolteacher's garden, Barnaby and Jones uncover jealous rivals, ruthless social climbers and a cottage with secrets.

episodes.guidance: With scenes some viewers may find disturbing.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby heads to Brighton where a property developer is beheaded at a fair. But what's the connection to a lady desperate to preserve her family line?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby heads to Brighton where a property developer is beheaded at a fair. But what's the connection to a lady desperate to preserve her family line?

episodes.synopsis: When Sonia Woodley is stabbed in the churchyard, Barnaby and Jones investigate - and the feudal village of Milton Cross starts to reveal its secrets.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When Sonia Woodley is stabbed in the churchyard, Barnaby and Jones investigate - and the feudal village of Milton Cross starts to reveal its secrets.

episodes.synopsis: In the village of Ford Florey, the annual Wild West fair becomes terrifyingly real when locals clash over the ownership of a piece of wasteland.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In the village of Ford Florey, the annual Wild West fair becomes terrifyingly real when locals clash over the ownership of a piece of wasteland.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby's wife Joyce swerves her car around a shadowy figure in the road. Later that night a body is discovered in the old cemetery. Was Joyce responsbile?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby's wife Joyce swerves her car around a shadowy figure in the road. Later that night a body is discovered in the old cemetery. Was Joyce responsbile?

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Jones investigate the drowning of a woman who jumped from a bridge, and discover connections to the past. Can they intervene before the body count escalates?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Jones investigate the drowning of a woman who jumped from a bridge, and discover connections to the past. Can they intervene before the body count escalates?

episodes.synopsis: Betrayal and blackmail fester in Midsomer Morchard as plans to re-enact a famous boxing match from 1860 turn nasty - and even Barnaby finds his judgement clouded.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Betrayal and blackmail fester in Midsomer Morchard as plans to re-enact a famous boxing match from 1860 turn nasty - and even Barnaby finds his judgement clouded.

episodes.synopsis: A planning dispute turns to murder after a member of a conservation society suspects her neighbours are involved in a money-making development scam.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A planning dispute turns to murder after a member of a conservation society suspects her neighbours are involved in a money-making development scam.

episodes.synopsis: When a woman dies at a health spa, Barnaby uncovers a feud between neighbours, money wrangles, and the mystery of a half-written novel. John Nettles' final case.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a woman dies at a health spa, Barnaby uncovers a feud between neighbours, money wrangles, and the mystery of a half-written novel. John Nettles' final case.

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence and some moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: The first case for new DCI John Barnaby is the death of a local DJ, who is crushed by a crank hammer at a girls' boarding school.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The first case for new DCI John Barnaby is the death of a local DJ, who is crushed by a crank hammer at a girls' boarding school.

episodes.synopsis: The lives of an eccentric couple come under scrutiny when a council official is killed and new DCI Barnaby must unearth old family secrets to find the killer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The lives of an eccentric couple come under scrutiny when a council official is killed and new DCI Barnaby must unearth old family secrets to find the killer.

episodes.guidance: Contains some scenes of graphic violence and frequent swearing.
episodes.synopsis: When a young woman is found dressed as a bride and drowned in a bath, it triggers a spate of ghoulish, wedding-themed murders. Is history repeating itself?

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a young woman is found dressed as a bride and drowned in a bath, it triggers a spate of ghoulish, wedding-themed murders. Is history repeating itself?

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence from the outset.
episodes.synopsis: Barnaby sends Jones undercover to investigate the disappearance of a female member of a New Age cult - is the case linked to a deadly boat explosion?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby sends Jones undercover to investigate the disappearance of a female member of a New Age cult - is the case linked to a deadly boat explosion?

episodes.guidance: Contains violence from the outset and throughout and some moderate language.
episodes.synopsis: Fingers point at local druids when a farmer is found murdered at a sacred stone circle, but Barnaby wonders if basic human greed is the real motive.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Fingers point at local druids when a farmer is found murdered at a sacred stone circle, but Barnaby wonders if basic human greed is the real motive.

episodes.guidance: With scenes of sexual violence against women, in an imitation of ancient pagan customs
episodes.synopsis: When a missing man turns up dead in a vat of cider, Barnaby and Jones must hunt for a killer in a Midsomer village that is steeped in bizarre local traditions.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a missing man turns up dead in a vat of cider, Barnaby and Jones must hunt for a killer in a Midsomer village that is steeped in bizarre local traditions.

episodes.synopsis: When a nun is killed at Midsomer Priory, teenage liaisons, missing antique silver, African art and holy orders make it a complex investigation for Barnaby and Jones.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a nun is killed at Midsomer Priory, teenage liaisons, missing antique silver, African art and holy orders make it a complex investigation for Barnaby and Jones.

episodes.synopsis: When a keen birdwatcher is killed, Barnaby and Jones go to investigate. Was the man's obsession with ornithology to blame, or something more sinister?

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a keen birdwatcher is killed, Barnaby and Jones go to investigate. Was the man's obsession with ornithology to blame, or something more sinister?

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Jones investigate when the appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths among an aristocratic family.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Jones investigate when the appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths among an aristocratic family.

episodes.synopsis: When a barrister is killed, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. He has a solid alibi, but Barnaby suspects that he is working with an accomplice.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a barrister is killed, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton. He has a solid alibi, but Barnaby suspects that he is working with an accomplice.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violent scenes.
episodes.synopsis: During a total eclipse of the sun, an amateur astronomer is killed by a blow to the head. Barnaby and Jones soon discover a dark side to the star-seeking world.

description.descriptionTextNormal: During a total eclipse of the sun, an amateur astronomer is killed by a blow to the head. Barnaby and Jones soon discover a dark side to the star-seeking world.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: When the famous sister of a local actress returns after 40 years, a series of killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the famous sister of a local actress returns after 40 years, a series of killings escalate, each of them reminiscent of a movie plot.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: Could the attack which left Harriet Farmer for dead a year ago be linked to moves on a chess board? And where is her boyfriend Finn?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Could the attack which left Harriet Farmer for dead a year ago be linked to moves on a chess board? And where is her boyfriend Finn?

episodes.guidance: Contains scenes of violence.
episodes.synopsis: When a woman is crushed to death by a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue, Barnaby and Jones are soon on the case.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a woman is crushed to death by a giant round of cheese at the home of the world-famous Midsomer Blue, Barnaby and Jones are soon on the case.

episodes.synopsis: New DS Charlie Nelson is thrown straight into a murder case when a man is stabbed with an antique sword at a ghost-hunting party.

description.descriptionTextNormal: New DS Charlie Nelson is thrown straight into a murder case when a man is stabbed with an antique sword at a ghost-hunting party.

episodes.synopsis: In Midsomer St Claire, some murders seem to be inspired by the macabre images on a medieval fresco, discovered in the church crypt. Barnaby and Nelson look deeper into the truth.

description.descriptionTextNormal: In Midsomer St Claire, some murders seem to be inspired by the macabre images on a medieval fresco, discovered in the church crypt. Barnaby and Nelson look deeper into the truth.

episodes.synopsis: When farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to Wyvern House restaurant and its tyrannical chef.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When farmer Martin Strickland is covered in truffle oil and mauled to death by a wild boar, the investigation leads to Wyvern House restaurant and its tyrannical chef.

episodes.synopsis: When a body drops out of a plane and is discovered in a reservoir, Barnaby and Nelson find that the world of stunt pilots and aviation heroes hides many dark secrets.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a body drops out of a plane and is discovered in a reservoir, Barnaby and Nelson find that the world of stunt pilots and aviation heroes hides many dark secrets.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Nelson travel to Copenhagen to join forces with local police, after the body of a Midsomer resident is found in the Danish city. 100th episode of the detective series.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Nelson travel to Copenhagen to join forces with local police, after the body of a Midsomer resident is found in the Danish city. 100th episode of the detective series.

episodes.synopsis: A crime festival in Luxton Deeping is jeopardised when a manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A crime festival in Luxton Deeping is jeopardised when a manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted.

episodes.synopsis: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and some ancient pagan traditions.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show, Barnaby and Nelson uncover conflict between the village church and some ancient pagan traditions.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates whether a ballad made famous by a late, lamented folk singer could have been the inspiration for a murder.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby investigates whether a ballad made famous by a late, lamented folk singer could have been the inspiration for a murder.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby tries to find out who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery. And what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby tries to find out who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery. And what does the attack have to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident?

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy landowner's body goes missing on the night of his death, DCI Barnaby, DS Nelson and new forensic pathologist Kam Karimore seek to identify the culprit.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a wealthy landowner's body goes missing on the night of his death, DCI Barnaby, DS Nelson and new forensic pathologist Kam Karimore seek to identify the culprit.

episodes.guidance: Includes some scenes of violence.
episodes.synopsis: When a forest ranger dies, UFO spotters are convinced aliens are responsible. The betrayals and secrets that emerge during Barnaby's investigation give him some useful pointers.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When a forest ranger dies, UFO spotters are convinced aliens are responsible. The betrayals and secrets that emerge during Barnaby's investigation give him some useful pointers.

episodes.synopsis: When the leader in a cycle race is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson are drawn into a ruthlessly competitive world of blackmail, bribery and bloodshed.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the leader in a cycle race is murdered, DCI Barnaby and DS Nelson are drawn into a ruthlessly competitive world of blackmail, bribery and bloodshed.

episodes.synopsis: Art comes to the picturesque Midsomer village of Angel's Rise with the opening of a new sculpture park, but DCI Barnaby must get creative when murder mars its opening.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Art comes to the picturesque Midsomer village of Angel's Rise with the opening of a new sculpture park, but DCI Barnaby must get creative when murder mars its opening.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: The discovery of a saint's bones at an archaeological dig causes a stir in the village of Midsomer Cicely when the leader of the dig is murdered.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The discovery of a saint's bones at an archaeological dig causes a stir in the village of Midsomer Cicely when the leader of the dig is murdered.

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of an equestrian centre is trampled by his horse, Barnaby and Nelson have to unravel a complex feud from the past where nothing is what it seems.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the owner of an equestrian centre is trampled by his horse, Barnaby and Nelson have to unravel a complex feud from the past where nothing is what it seems.

episodes.episodeTitle: The Village That Rose From the Dead
episodes.synopsis: Someone is murdered during the reopening of ghost village Little Auburn. DCI Barnaby must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

description.descriptionTextStrong: 1. The Village That Rose From the Dead
description.descriptionTextNormal: Someone is murdered during the reopening of ghost village Little Auburn. DCI Barnaby must unravel a sinister web of lies from both past and present in order to catch the killer.

episodes.numberedEpisodeTitle: 1. The Village That Rose From the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby learns how far some people will go for power when he investigates the death of someone from the Bleakridge Watch patrol group in the most remote village in Midsomer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby learns how far some people will go for power when he investigates the death of someone from the Bleakridge Watch patrol group in the most remote village in Midsomer.

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Winter investigate the death of a star cricketer during a tournament, but could the dislike of a cricket format really be the motive for murder?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Barnaby and Winter investigate the death of a star cricketer during a tournament, but could the dislike of a cricket format really be the motive for murder?

episodes.synopsis: When DCI Barnaby and DS Winter discover a dead body covered in live rabbits, a sinister side to the local pet show is revealed. Is this a case of rivalry taken too far - or is the killer driven by something much darker?

description.descriptionTextNormal: When DCI Barnaby and DS Winter discover a dead body covered in live rabbits, a sinister side to the local pet show is revealed. Is this a case of rivalry taken too far - or is the killer driven by something much darker?

episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby and DS Winter hunt a killer after a young girl dressed in period costume slips away from a Jane Austen weekend and is found dead in the woods.

description.descriptionTextNormal: DCI Barnaby and DS Winter hunt a killer after a young girl dressed in period costume slips away from a Jane Austen weekend and is found dead in the woods.

episodes.synopsis: When the winner of a classical music award is murdered, Barnaby and Winter's investigation leads them into a world haunted by a curse.

description.descriptionTextNormal: When the winner of a classical music award is murdered, Barnaby and Winter's investigation leads them into a world haunted by a curse.

episodes.guidance: Contains some violence.
episodes.synopsis: A new brewery in Causton opens on the site of a famously cursed abbey. However, excitement turns to fear when a man is found boiled to death in a vat.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A new brewery in Causton opens on the site of a famously cursed abbey. However, excitement turns to fear when a man is found boiled to death in a vat.

episodes.synopsis: A headmaster and avid butterfly collector is found murdered, pinned to the wall like one of his treasured specimens. Can DCI Barnaby and DS Winter catch the culprit in time?

description.descriptionTextNormal: A headmaster and avid butterfly collector is found murdered, pinned to the wall like one of his treasured specimens. Can DCI Barnaby and DS Winter catch the culprit in time?

episodes.synopsis: The village of Carver Valley is shocked by the murder of a former supermodel during its comic festival. Barnaby and Winter are left trying to separate fact from fiction.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The village of Carver Valley is shocked by the murder of a former supermodel during its comic festival. Barnaby and Winter are left trying to separate fact from fiction.

episodes.synopsis: A death at Stubbington Hall Sports Club, home to the Causton Lions rugby team, allows Barnaby to relive his former sporting glory. But who held grudges towards the victim?

description.descriptionTextNormal: A death at Stubbington Hall Sports Club, home to the Causton Lions rugby team, allows Barnaby to relive his former sporting glory. But who held grudges towards the victim?

episodes.synopsis: Not happy about being dragged to a wedding by his wife Sarah, things go from bad to worse for Barnaby when the bride is murdered. He must unveil the killer.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Not happy about being dragged to a wedding by his wife Sarah, things go from bad to worse for Barnaby when the bride is murdered. He must unveil the killer.

episodes.synopsis: A series of sinister clown sightings, threats, and deathly, dangerous acts ensue when Ferabbees Circus comes to town. Barnaby must face up to his fears in order to solve the case.

description.descriptionTextNormal: A series of sinister clown sightings, threats, and deathly, dangerous acts ensue when Ferabbees Circus comes to town. Barnaby must face up to his fears in order to solve the case.

episodes.synopsis: Midsomer is buzzing with excitement at the arrival of the annual Paramount Dance Extravaganza, but behind the sequins and smiles are deep running feuds and passions, and when the stakes are high, the desire to win can outweigh just about anything.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Midsomer is buzzing with excitement at the arrival of the annual Paramount Dance Extravaganza, but behind the sequins and smiles are deep running feuds and passions, and when the stakes are high, the desire to win can outweigh just about anything.

episodes.synopsis: Numerous motives point towards the murder of prolific estate agent Alexander Beauvoisin, shot dead at a museum whilst unveiling a collection of doll's houses. But who is the killer?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Numerous motives point towards the murder of prolific estate agent Alexander Beauvoisin, shot dead at a museum whilst unveiling a collection of doll's houses. But who is the killer?

episodes.synopsis: The Deddington family has a thriving bee empire that put Granville Norton on the map, but how far will they go to ensure they are never dethroned?

description.descriptionTextNormal: The Deddington family has a thriving bee empire that put Granville Norton on the map, but how far will they go to ensure they are never dethroned?

episodes.synopsis: Women and fishermen flock to the village of Solomon Gorge, each person desperate to catch a giant fish that is said to lurk in the lake. However, their plans are threatened.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Women and fishermen flock to the village of Solomon Gorge, each person desperate to catch a giant fish that is said to lurk in the lake. However, their plans are threatened.

episodes.episodeTitle: The Wolf Hunter of Little Worthy
episodes.synopsis: After a struggling photographer wins a competition to create an urban myth, his creation of The Wolf Hunter unexpectedly gains a cult following - and results in a murder.

description.descriptionTextStrong: 1. The Wolf Hunter of Little Worthy
description.descriptionTextNormal: After a struggling photographer wins a competition to create an urban myth, his creation of The Wolf Hunter unexpectedly gains a cult following - and results in a murder.

episodes.numberedEpisodeTitle: 1. The Wolf Hunter of Little Worthy

episodes.synopsis: Following the arrival of a new member to Midsomer's club for recovering heart bypass patients, lives are cut short at the clinic.

description.descriptionTextNormal: Following the arrival of a new member to Midsomer's club for recovering heart bypass patients, lives are cut short at the clinic.

episodes.synopsis: As the owners of Karras Games gather for a murder mystery weekend, the immersive experience takes a puzzling twist when a killer strikes for real. The police's detective skills are put to the test as they are forced to solve this case on their own.

description.descriptionTextNormal: As the owners of Karras Games gather for a murder mystery weekend, the immersive experience takes a puzzling twist when a killer strikes for real. The police's detective skills are put to the test as they are forced to solve this case on their own.

episodes.guidance: Expect scenes of threat and violence.
episodes.synopsis: Midsomer's annual scarecrow festival takes a grisly turn when dead bodies begin appearing on poles, but what is behind the murders?

description.descriptionTextNormal: Midsomer's annual scarecrow festival takes a grisly turn when dead bodies begin appearing on poles, but what is behind the murders?

episodes.guidance: Contains violence and some sexual scenes.
episodes.synopsis: The sleepy calm of Badger's Drift village is shattered when one of its elderly residents is found dead in her cottage. DCI Tom Barnaby is sure it was not an accident.

description.descriptionTextNormal: The sleepy calm of Badger's Drift village is shattered when one of its elderly residents is found dead in her cottage. DCI Tom Barnaby is sure it was not an accident.
